The following nbwrpg poll is now closed.  Here are the 
final results: 


POLL QUESTION: What's the greatest song from the 
Transformers: The 
Movie soundtrack (Unicron's theme 
added)? 

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- "The Touch" by Stan Bush, 1 votes, 11.11%  
- "Unicron's Theme" by Vince DiCola, 1 votes, 11.11%  
- "Instruments of Destruction" by N.R.G., 1 votes, 11.11%  
- "Death of Optimus Prime" by Vince DiCola, 0 votes, 0.00%  
- "Dare" by Stan Bush, 3 votes, 33.33%  
- "Nothin's Gonna Stand In Our Way" by Spectre General, 0 votes, 0.00%  
- "The Transformers" by Lion (TF:TM theme), 1 votes, 11.11%  
- "Escape" by Vince DiCola, 0 votes, 0.00%  
- "Hunger" by Spectre General, 1 votes, 11.11%  
- "Autobot/Decepticon Battle" by Vince DiCola, 1 votes, 11.11%  

INDIVIDUAL VOTES
- "The Touch" by Stan Bush
